title: France panorama. [No. 68/25]
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/France - Politics and government
description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Towards resumption of normal activities in France - After a general strike, and with resumption of activities in many sectors, France is looking her normal self again. 2. In the news: The Salon de Mai (May Salon) Painting Exhibition. The Fontenay aux Roses Electrical Research Center. 3. Women and sports - Dany Duflot, world water-ski champion; Claude Mandonnaud, European 400 meter free-style swimming champion; Nicole Bera, French parachute champion. 4. Notre Dame de Paris - Eight centuries have gone by since Maurice de Sully decided to have Notre Dame built. Although Paris has changed faces, the cathedral has stood unchanged through the ages, a world centre of faith.
